meanings.definition: The solid part of the surface of the earth.
meanings.sent1: The land is where we walk and build our homes.
meanings.sent2: The farmer worked the land to grow crops.
meanings.sent3: The land seemed to be smiling under the bright sun.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a vast land of creativity waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The land stretched out before us, endless and full of possibilities.

meanings.sent1: She traveled to a distant land to learn about new cultures.
meanings.sent2: The explorer set out to discover uncharted lands.
meanings.sent3: In the land of dreams, anything is possible.
meanings.sent4: His heart longed for the familiar land of his childhood.
meanings.sent5: The land of opportunity welcomed all who dared to dream big.

meanings.definition: To bring a boat to land.
meanings.sent1: The captain decided to land the ship at the nearest port.
meanings.sent2: After a long journey, they finally landed on the shore.
meanings.sent3: The boat landed smoothly, much to the relief of the passengers.
meanings.sent4: She landed the canoe expertly, impressing her friends.
meanings.sent5: The seagulls watched as the fishing boat landed its catch for the day.
